comments.author: philipp@bugzilla.kewis.ch
comments.text:
For versions post 1.0, we should consider allowing a downgrade so users can switch between versions without issues.

To do this, we'd need an extra set of downgraders that inverts the change done by the upgrader. Previous versions (i.e < 20) should not be available for downgrade.
